message.content:
cs.IT, cs.AR, cs.DC, cs.SY, cs.EM. 

The paper discusses the use of belief propagation decoding algorithm for LDPC codes, which is a common topic in information theory (cs.IT). The paper also proposes efficient LDPC block-code decoders/simulators which run on graphics processing units (GPUs), which falls under the category of computer architecture and computer systems (cs.AR and cs.DC). The paper also discusses the optimization of data structures and thread hierarchy, which are common topics in systems and control (cs.SY) and embedded systems (cs.EM).
